results: The wife of a farmer, fisherman, or miner.

results: A fellow witch who kidnapped her as a young girl.
A fellow witch who aided her in a time of need.
Communication with the spirits of the dead.

results: Contact a dead relative or friend.

results: The hand of a mortal man.

results: Transforming into a beast (2): 1. bat; 2. cat; 3. fox; 4. horse; 5. owl; 6. rat; 7. raven; 8. wolf.

An elemental spirit (8): 1. air; 2. earth; 3. fire; 4. ice; 5. mud; 6. storm; 7. stone; 8. water.
